Title: Stackings and the W-cycles conjecture
Abstract: © Canadian Mathematical Society 2017.We prove Wise's W-cycles conjecture. Consider a compact graph γ′ immersing into another graph γ. For any immersed cycle Λ: S1 → γ, we consider the map Λ′ from the circular components S of the pullback to γ′. Unless Λ′ is reducible, the degree of the covering map S → S1 is bounded above by minus the Euler characteristic of γ′. As a corollary, any finitely generated subgroup of a one-relator group has a finitely generated Schur multiplier.
